title: Pixel 4a: Awful interface!
content:
Why did Google create such an awful interface on the 4a?? Almost every time I try to "swipe left" to view more information on a page, it interprets the motion as "go back" and I lose what I'm trying to do. The same thing happens when trying to scroll down on a page: either the phone interprets this motion as a click/tap or it goes back to the home screen. This also creates a ridiculous amount of unintentional ad response/interactions. Why is it so difficult to just scroll???

I desperately miss the home and back buttons. I feel like I'm using an iPhone, which I hate for the main reason that it lacks the "back" button. 

Sadly, I just missed the 15 day return window (I thought it was 30 days) so I guess I'm stuck with this thing for a while. Planning to go back to Samsung in the future.
